original_title: President directs to increase fertilizer subsidy for paddy farmers
original_body_lines: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake has directed the Treasury to increase the fertilizer subsidy provided for paddy farmers from Rs. 15,000 to Rs. 25,000 per hectare for the 2024/25 Maha season.
Accordingly, the fertilizer subsidy to be increased with effect from October 01, the President’s Media Division (PMD) said.
